title: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - File
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32)
sigma: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (EventID=11 AND ((TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\OskSupport.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\system32\\DllHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Windows Media Player\\osk.exe' ESCAPE '\')))
